root.name: curveTangent()

example.code: noFill() curve(5, 26, 73, 24, 73, 61, 15, 65) steps = 6 for i in range(steps): t = i / float(steps) x = curvePoint(5, 73, 73, 15, t) y = curvePoint(26, 24, 61, 65, t) #ellipse(x, y, 5, 5) tx = curveTangent(5, 73, 73, 15, t) ty = curveTangent(26, 24, 61, 65, t) a = atan2(ty, tx) a -= PI/2.0 line(x, y, cos(a)*8 + x, sin(a)*8 + y)

root.description: Calculates the tangent of a point on a curve. There's a good definition of tangent on Wikipedia.

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: float: coordinate of first point on the curve

parameter.label: b
parameter.description: float: coordinate of first control point

parameter.label: c
parameter.description: float: coordinate of second control point

parameter.label: d
parameter.description: float: coordinate of second point on the curve
